titleInfo.title: Bird’s Eye View of San Francisco and surrounding country
Bird’s Eye View of the City of San Francisco and Surrounding Country

physicalDescription.note: good; one discolored streak upper left edge

mods.abstract: View looking east across bay to Sierras with Pacific and fort in foreground, with ships leaving Golden Gate, city view and harbor in mid distance, and east bay and snow-covered mountains in distance.

titleInfo.title: Reid W. Dennis collection of California lithographs, 1850-1906

mods.accessCondition: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Special Collections Public Services Librarian at speccollref@stanford.edu.
